svg.text: jsgui3-html ‚Äî Aero-Grade Full Application Window Mockup
Design Notes: The Aero-Luna Premium Visual Language
‚óè Title bars use translucent glass gradient (rgba colors with blur hint)
‚óè Buttons have the XP "split gradient" ‚Äî white highlight top, color below, with a distinct midpoint seam
‚óè Hover state uses warm orange glow (not just darkening) ‚Äî feels alive and responsive
‚óè Close button is always red with a white ‚úï ‚Äî high contrast, instantly recognizable
‚óè Sidebar uses blue gradient on white text ‚Äî the "task pane" from XP/7 Explorer
‚óè Selected items in lists use deep blue (#316AC5) ‚Äî the classic Windows selection color
‚óè Menu has an icon gutter (left column) and keyboard shortcut column (right-aligned)
‚óè Taskbar uses the deep blue gradient with green Start button and translucent system tray
‚óè Scrollbars have beveled arrows, a thumb with grip lines, and a subtle track gradient
This visual language celebrates depth, warmth, and tactile interaction ‚Äî neither flat nor excessive, but polished and inviting.
